      so it seems like there is something wrong with the listView of the java FX when i delete a chat so the initialize method acts like whats app and shows that this message is deleted and doesn't actually delete it :))

    • deleteMessage

      public void deleteMessage​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      this method deletes one item of a chat. it sends the message which is about to be deleted and loads the page again.

    • editMessage

      public void editMessage​(javafx.event.ActionEvent mouseEvent)
      this method makes the text area and button for editing a message visible

    • edit

      public void edit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      this method is for editing the message. when the user writes the new message it sends the message and the new text to server and saves the changes.
